lead_paragraph: Scottish FA chief executive Stewart Regan has backed the idea of cross-border leagues and believes they could also help maintain the popularity of the Champions League in the long run.

headline.print_headline: Cross-Border Leagues Can Help Prevent Champions League Decline-SFA
headline.main: Cross-Border Leagues Can Help Prevent Champions League Decline-SFA

snippet: Scottish FA chief executive Stewart Regan has backed the idea of cross-border leagues and believes they could also help maintain the popularity of the Champions League in the long run....
